author: Kometa-Team
install_msg: You have just installed the 'botlogs' cog. Have fun! Activate with `!botlogs <num_lines>` or just `!botlogs` to grab the last 50 lines
name: botlogs
short: This cog will react to `!botlogs` (default of last 50 lines) or `!botlogs <num_lines>` within your server and share the logs from the current bot.
description: This cog will react to `!botlogs` (default of last 50 lines) or `!botlogs <num_lines>` within your server and share the logs from the current bot.
